rules_text:
Ward–Discard a noncreature card.
Once each turn, you may have a white noncreature spell you cast cost {W} less to cast. You may do the same for blue and {U}, black and {B}, red and {R}, green and {G}, and colorless and {C}. This effect can't reduce the amount of mana a spell costs to cast to less than one mana.
